/obj/item/seeds/ambrosia/deus.desc: These seeds grow into ambrosia deus. Could it be the food of the gods..?

/obj/item/seeds/ambrosia/gaia.desc: These seeds grow into ambrosia gaia, filled with infinite potential.

/obj/item/seeds/ambrosia.desc: These seeds grow into common ambrosia, a plant grown by and from medicine.

/obj/item/seeds/apple/gold.desc: These seeds grow into golden apple trees. Good thing there are no firebirds in space.

/obj/item/seeds/apple.desc: These seeds grow into apple trees.

/obj/item/seeds/banana/mime.desc: They're seeds that grow into mimana trees. When grown, keep away from mime.

/obj/item/seeds/banana/bluespace.desc: They're seeds that grow into bluespace banana trees. When grown, keep away from bluespace clown.

/obj/item/seeds/banana.desc: They're seeds that grow into banana trees. When grown, keep away from clown.

/obj/item/seeds/soya/koi.desc: These seeds grow into koibean plants.

/obj/item/seeds/soya.desc: These seeds grow into soybean plants.

/obj/item/seeds/berry/poison.desc: These seeds grow into poison-berry bushes.

/obj/item/seeds/berry/death.desc: These seeds grow into death berries.

/obj/item/seeds/berry/glow.desc: These seeds grow into glow-berry bushes.

/obj/item/seeds/berry.desc: These seeds grow into berry bushes.

/obj/item/seeds/cherry/bomb.desc: They give you vibes of dread and frustration.

/obj/item/seeds/cherry.desc: Careful not to crack a tooth on one... That'd be the pits.

/obj/item/seeds/grape/green.desc: These seeds grow into green-grape vines.

/obj/item/seeds/grape.desc: These seeds grow into grape vines.

/obj/item/seeds/cannabis/rainbow.desc: These seeds grow into rainbow weed. Groovy.

/obj/item/seeds/cannabis/death.desc: These seeds grow into deathweed. Not groovy.

/obj/item/seeds/cannabis/white.desc: I will give unto him that is munchies of the fountain of the cravings of life, freely.

/obj/item/seeds/cannabis/ultimate.desc: These seeds grow into omega weed.

/obj/item/seeds/wheat/oat.desc: These may, or may not, grow into oat.

/obj/item/seeds/wheat/rice.desc: These may, or may not, grow into rice.

/obj/item/seeds/wheat/meat.desc: If you ever wanted to drive a vegetarian to insanity, here's how.

/obj/item/seeds/wheat.desc: These may, or may not, grow into wheat.

/obj/item/seeds/chili/ice.desc: These seeds grow into ice pepper plants.

/obj/item/seeds/chili/ghost.desc: These seeds grow into a chili said to be the hottest in the galaxy.

/obj/item/seeds/chili.desc: These seeds grow into chili plants. HOT! HOT! HOT!

/obj/item/seeds/firelemon.desc: When life gives you lemons, don't make lemonade. Make life take the lemons back! Get mad! I don't want your damn lemons!

/obj/item/seeds/cocoapod/vanillapod.desc: These seeds grow into vanilla trees. They look fattening.

/obj/item/seeds/cocoapod/bungotree.desc: These seeds grow into bungo trees. They appear to be heavy and almost perfectly spherical.

/obj/item/seeds/cocoapod.desc: These seeds grow into cacao trees. They look fattening.

/obj/item/seeds/corn.desc: I don't mean to sound corny...

/obj/item/seeds/cotton/durathread.desc: A pack of seeds that'll grow into an extremely durable thread that could easily rival plasteel if woven properly.

/obj/item/seeds/cotton.desc: A pack of seeds that'll grow into a cotton plant. Assistants make good free labor if neccesary.

/obj/item/seeds/eggplant/eggy.desc: These seeds grow to produce berries that look a lot like eggs.

/obj/item/seeds/eggplant.desc: These seeds grow to produce berries that look nothing like eggs.

/obj/item/seeds/poppy/lily/trumpet.desc: A plant sculped by extensive genetic engineering. The spaceman's trumpet is said to bear no resemblance to its wild ancestors. Inside NT AgriSci circles it is better known as NTPW-0372.

/obj/item/seeds/harebell.desc: These seeds grow into pretty little flowers.

/obj/item/seeds/sunflower/moonflower.desc: Its petals are known for helping insomiacs around the world.

/obj/item/seeds/garlic.desc: A packet of extremely pungent seeds.

/obj/item/seeds/grass/carpet.desc: These seeds grow into stylish carpet samples.

/obj/item/seeds/grass.desc: These seeds grow into grass. Yummy!

/obj/item/seeds/kudzu.desc: These seeds grow into a weed that grows incredibly fast.

/obj/item/seeds/watermelon/holy.desc: These seeds grow into holymelon plants.

/obj/item/seeds/watermelon.desc: These seeds grow into watermelon plants.

/obj/item/seeds/starthistle/corpse_flowe.desc: A species of plant that emits a horrible odor. The odor stops being produced in difficult atmospheric conditions.

/obj/item/seeds/starthistle.desc: A robust species of weed that often springs up in-between the cracks of spaceship parking lots.

/obj/item/seeds/galaxythistle.desc: An impressive species of weed that is thought to have evolved from the simple milk thistle. Contains flavolignans that can help repair a damaged liver.

/obj/item/seeds/reishi.desc: This mycelium grows into something medicinal and relaxing.

/obj/item/seeds/amanita.desc: This mycelium grows into something horrible.

/obj/item/seeds/angel.desc: This mycelium grows into something devastating.

/obj/item/seeds/liberty.desc: This mycelium grows into liberty-cap mushrooms.

/obj/item/seeds/plump/walkingmushroom.desc: This mycelium will grow into huge stuff!

/obj/item/seeds/plump.desc: This mycelium grows into helmets... maybe.

/obj/item/seeds/chanter.desc: This mycelium grows into chanterelle mushrooms.

/obj/item/seeds/chanterelle/jupitercup.desc: This mycelium grows into jupiter cups. Zeus would be envious at the power at your fingertips.

/obj/item/seeds/glowshroom/shadowshroom.desc: This mycelium will grow into something shadowy.

/obj/item/seeds/potato/sweet.desc: These seeds grow into sweet potato plants.

/obj/item/seeds/potato.desc: Boil 'em! Mash 'em! Stick 'em in a stew!

/obj/item/seeds/pumpkin/blumpkin.desc: These seeds grow into blumpkin vines.

/obj/item/seeds/pumpkin.desc: These seeds grow into pumpkin vines.

/obj/item/seeds/rainbow_bunch.desc: A pack of seeds that'll grow into a beautiful bush of various colored flowers.

/obj/item/seeds/random.desc: Mysterious seeds as strange as their name implies. Spooky.

/obj/item/seeds/replicapod.desc: These seeds grow into replica pods. They say these are used to harvest humans.

/obj/item/seeds/whitebeet.desc: These seeds grow into sugary beet producing plants.

/obj/item/seeds/redbeet.desc: These seeds grow into red beet producing plants.

/obj/item/seeds/tea/astra.desc: These seeds grow into tea plants.

/obj/item/seeds/tea.desc: These seeds grow into tea plants.

/obj/item/seeds/coffee/robusta.desc: These seeds grow into coffee robusta bushes.

/obj/item/seeds/coffee.desc: These seeds grow into coffee arabica bushes.

/obj/item/seeds/tobacco/space.desc: These seeds grow into space tobacco plants.

/obj/item/seeds/tobacco/lavaland.desc: These seeds grow into lavaland tobacco plants.

/obj/item/seeds/tobacco.desc: These seeds grow into tobacco plants.

/obj/item/seeds/tomato/blood.desc: These seeds grow into blood-tomato plants.

/obj/item/seeds/tomato/blue/bluespace.desc: These seeds grow into bluespace tomato plants.

/obj/item/seeds/tomato/blue.desc: These seeds grow into blue-tomato plants.

/obj/item/seeds/tomato/killer.desc: These seeds grow into killer-tomato plants.

/obj/item/seeds/tomato.desc: These seeds grow into tomato plants.

/obj/item/seeds/tower/steel.desc: This mycelium grows into steel logs.

/obj/item/seeds/tower.desc: This mycelium grows into tower-cap mushrooms.

/obj/item/seeds/bamboo.desc: Plant known for their flexible and resistant logs.

/obj/item/seeds/lavaland/cactus.desc: These seeds grow into fruiting cacti.

/obj/item/seeds/lavaland/polypore.desc: This mycelium grows into bracket mushrooms, also known as polypores. Woody and firm, shaft miners often use them for makeshift crafts.

/obj/item/seeds/lavaland/porcini.desc: This mycelium grows into Boletus edulus, also known as porcini. Native to the late Earth, but discovered on Lavaland. Has culinary, medicinal and relaxant effects.

/obj/item/seeds/lavaland/inocybe.desc: This mycelium grows into an inocybe mushroom, a species of Lavaland origin with hallucinatory and toxic effects.

/obj/item/seeds/lavaland/ember.desc: This mycelium grows into embershrooms, a species of bioluminescent mushrooms native to Lavaland.
